name: TOO FAST
description:
You drive a car with uncontrollable speed. Why? Don't ask, instead focus on the police cars and signs coming at you!

This game is a remake of on old project of the same name made with Construct 2. I gave up on it, and recently thought I could try remaking it from scratch in Godot, and this time actually finish it! So this project started 5 or 6 years ago, and I'm finally done with it now ^^ The original ressources are available on OpenGameArt.

I also tried to focus on content production, and not so much about code improvement and clarity, just to see how much I could speed it up. End results? This isn't a good idea at all... I actually spent much more time on the code than before, so look into the source code at your own risk!

Have fun!

Credits

Online leaderboard by SilentWolf (https://silentwolf.com/)

Battle by Jahzzar (https://soundcloud.com/jahzzar/)

Orbital Colossus by Matthew Pablo (https://www.matthewpablo.com)
